name: Constructable
headline: AI copilot for construction teams
description: Constructable is an AI chat for construction managers that collects all the data for a commercial construction project from Procore, email, documents, and chat to answer questions like "What slope is needed for drainage?" or "how do the submitted electrical bids compare?" We can answer questions in seconds that used to take hours and help teams prevent mistakes that cost hundreds of thousands of dollars.

founders.name: Emma Nazim, Founder
founders.description: I am a co-founder and CEO at Constructable. Previously I was a VP of Product at Appfolio and led the product team for Appfolio Investment Manager from 0 to 1500 customers. I love working with customers and building vertical software, but outside of that, you can find me making mugs and bowls where no two ever look the same.

founders.name: Molly Abbott, Founder
founders.description: I am a co-founder and CPO at Constructable. Since 2010, I have had the privilege to work along side amazing leaders in Product, Operations and Partnerships at both Mindbody and AppFolio. Growing up in a construction family, and then marrying into one, I'm excited to be in both tech and construction.

founders.name: John Yoder, Founder
founders.description: I am a co-founder and CTO at Constructable. Prior to this, I was the VP of Engineering for AppFolio Property Manager where I grew the team from 65 engineers to 250 engineers over 4 years. I am most satisfied when my team can hear the joy in a customer's voice because of something we accomplished together.

# Constructable is the only team-first construction management tool for building the future
Meet the system for modern construction and take your company to the next level.
[Get Started ](https://www.constructable.ai/</#contact-us>)![Hero Image](https://www.constructable.ai/hero.png)
## Made for modern construction teams
Constructable is shaped by the practices and principles that distinguish world-class construction teams from the rest—relentless focus, high caliber execution and a commitment to the quality of craft.
#### Purpose-built for construction
Constructable was developed to empower commercial construction teams to do their best work. Every feature is intentionally designed to help teams focus on what they do best: build amazing projects.
#### Designed to move fast, anywhere
Constructable is built for high performance across your team, and their devices—phones, tablets and computers. Constructable helps teams solve problems and make decisions faster than that ‘other bidder’.
#### Meticulously crafted
Gone are the days of clunky, slow, and bloated tools. Constructable is snappy, speedy, and a pleasure to use. It's intuitive and easy to learn, but flexible enough to adapt to your team’s unique way of working.
## Effortless collaboration, in context
Constructable's team-first approach means that everyone on the project stays aligned, focused, and out of each other's email inbox. Your team can make decisions faster and catch costly mistakes before they happen.
## Effortless collaboration, in context
Constructable's team-first approach means that everyone on the project stays aligned, focused, and out of each other's email inbox. Your team can make decisions faster and catch costly mistakes before they happen.
### Quick screen video capture
![Quick screen video capture](https://www.constructable.ai/quick-screen-video-capture.png)
### Share only with who you want to
### Work together directly on plans
### Comment and tag people in context
Quick screen video capture Share only with who you want toWork together directly on plans Comment and tag people
![Quick screen video capture](https://www.constructable.ai/quick-screen-video-capture.png)
## Put AI to work on your team today
At Constructable, useful AI features are built right in—not bolted on. Let your team experience the powerful efficiency gains that artificial intelligence can provide for them right now.
#### Get answers fast with AI-powered search
Type in a project-specific question and our proprietary AI will check all your drawings, documents, contracts, and more to get you the correct answer.
#### Smart photo search—find the right photos in seconds
Easily locate the photos you need without scrolling through endless images. Just ask, and our AI brings up the relevant images instantly.
![Smart photo search—find the right photos in seconds](https://www.constructable.ai/ai-image-2-mobile.png)
## Tools your team will actually love to use
Constructable provides a comprehensive suite of tools designed to streamline your construction projects and enhance team collaboration.
#### Drawings
Quickly upload, view, and annotate construction drawings directly from your device. Share updates in real-time with your team to ensure everyone stays aligned on the latest designs.
#### Photos
Capture site conditions with ease and store them in one place for reference and documentation. Seamlessly integrate these photos directly onto the plans or daily reports for better project tracking.
#### AI Search
Use AI-driven search to find key project documents, discussions, or files instantly. Save time and increase efficiency with smart recommendations and advanced filtering options.
#### Daily Logs
Keep detailed records of daily activities on the job site. Record weather, workforce, equipment, and progress in a simple, user-friendly interface that enhances accountability and transparency.
#### Punch List
Stay on top of project tasks by creating, assigning, and managing punch lists. Easily track item status, and verify completion of tasks to ensure all work is done in a timely and organized manner.
#### RFIs
Quickly generate formal RFIs from informal working sessions without missing a beat. Speed up response times and keep everything organized in one place for easy access and documentation.
#### Submittals
Manage and review submittals with ease, ensuring all materials and equipment meet project specifications. Automated workflows reduce delays and keep projects moving forward.
#### Financials
Gain full visibility into project financials, from budget tracking to forecasting. Stay on budget by closely monitoring expenses and change orders, ensuring project profitability.
## Simple, predictable pricing
Get all the tools your team needs at a flat annual rate. All plans include unlimited users, collaborators, projects, support, and onboarding.
Field Management| Field and Project Management| Field, Project, and Financial Management  
---|---|---  
Price| starting at$10K/year| starting at$25K/year| starting at$40K/year  
Drawings and Collaboration  
Photos and Documents  
Punch List and Daily Logs  
RFIs and Submittals  
Email Integration  
Change Orders and Contracts  
Budgeting and Financials  
## Built on strong foundations
Constructable is so simple to use, it's easy to overlook the wealth of complex technologies packed under the hood that keep Constructable robust, safe, and blazing fast.
#### Goodbye, loading spinners
Since all of your data is stored locally on your device, you never have to wait for pages to load. Once you feel the speed, you'll never go back.
#### Enterprise-ready security
Best-in-class security practices keep your work and your client's information safe and secure at every layer.
#### Engineered for offline
No internet connection? No problem. Your team's work is stored on-device and seamlessly syncs when they're online again.
> "Constructable synchronized the plan review process—creating topic tracking, plan markups, and an organized history in half the time. I can’t go back to our old software.”
![Ryan Adams from Abbott|Reed](https://www.constructable.ai/ryan.jpg)
Ryan Adams
Senior Project Manager
![](https://www.constructable.ai/abbottreed.svg)
![Ryan Adams from Abbott|Reed](https://www.constructable.ai/ryan.jpg)
> “Constructable synchronized the plan review process—creating topic tracking, plan markups, and an organized history in half the time. I can’t go back to our old software.”
Ryan Adams
Senior Project Manager
![](https://www.constructable.ai/abbottreed.svg)

generated_description:
**Constructable: The AI Copilot for Construction Teams**

Founded in 2023 and part of Y Combinator's Batch S23, Constructable is making waves in the commercial construction space from its base in Santa Barbara, CA. The company's mission is clear: to be the definitive AI copilot for construction teams, allowing projects to run smoother and more efficiently.

At its core, Constructable started as an AI-driven chat tool tailored for construction managers. It expertly gathers data from platforms like Procore, emails, and various documents to provide rapid answers to common, yet critical, project questions—things that could traditionally drag on for hours. Imagine needing to know the ideal slope for drainage or comparing submitted electrical bids; with Constructable, these queries can be resolved in seconds, helping teams avoid costly mistakes that could amount to hundreds of thousands of dollars.

Constructable is more than just a chatbot, however. The platform is designed with a team-first mindset, enhancing collaboration by keeping all project members aligned and reducing the reliance on cluttered email threads. With Constructable, teams can share updates, comment directly on plans, and even capture screenshots of discussions—all in real-time.

### Key Features:

- **Lightning-fast AI Search**: Ask project-specific questions, and the AI combs through all project documents to deliver precise responses.
- **Smart Photo Search**: Say goodbye to endless scrolling. The AI helps locate relevant images in seconds.
- **Project Tracking Tools**: Includes features for managing drawings, photos, daily logs, RFIs, and financial visibility—all designed for ease of use and efficiency.
- **Simple Pricing**: Access all necessary tools at a straightforward annual rate, accommodating unlimited users.

### Why Choose Constructable?

1. **User-Centric Design**: The platform is crafted to be intuitive, ensuring even the least tech-savvy can navigate it easily. 
2. **Speed**: Local data storage means no annoying loading times; everything is ready when you need it.
3. **Offline Capabilities**: Work seamlessly without internet. Constructable syncs data once you’re back online.
4. **Enterprise-Ready Security**: Prioritizing safety, Constructable implements robust security measures at every level.

Constructable’s features have resonated with clients, as highlighted by Ryan Adams, a Senior Project Manager, who raved about the tool's efficiency in synchronizing their plan review process.

With a lean team of just three and strong backing from industry partners, Constructable is not just another tool—it’s set to redefine how the construction industry collaborates and communicates. Builders, get ready to elevate your projects to unprecedented levels of efficiency and oversight!

Explore more about Constructable at [constructable.ai](https://www.constructable.ai).
